Name: Raspberry 'Martini' (by Dick Bradsell)
Ingredients: 2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Review: Rich raspberry flavour laced with gin.
History: Created in 1997 by Dick Bradsell , London, England and originally named Raspberry Martini.
